dcterms:description: The BRATS dataset is a benchmark for the segmentation of brain tumors in multimodal MRI images, providing a standardized dataset for evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: BRATS (Multimodal Brain Tumor Image Segmentation Benchmark)

dcterms:creator: Arnaud Arindra Adiyoso Setio
Jasper D. D. de Jong
Bram van Ginneken
M. A. (M. A.) van Ginneken

dcterms:description: The LUNA16 dataset is designed for the automatic detection of pulmonary nodules in computed tomography images, providing a platform for evaluating detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: LUNA16 (Lung Nodule Analysis)

dcterms:creator: Julio Saez-Rodriguez
Lena Maier-Hein
Klaus H Maier-Hein
dcterms:description: The DREAM Challenges are a series of collaborative competitions aimed at advancing biomedical research through community engagement and innovative solutions.
dcterms:title: DREAM Challenges

dcterms:description: The ImageCLEF Challenges provide a platform for evaluating image retrieval and classification algorithms across various domains.
dcterms:title: ImageCLEF Challenges

dcterms:creator: Lena Maier-Hein
Julio Saez-Rodriguez
dcterms:description: The MICCAI Challenges focus on various aspects of medical image computing and computer-assisted interventions, providing a platform for benchmarking algorithms.
dcterms:title: MICCAI Challenges
